snippet.title: Lost Ember - Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Lost Ember is OUT NOW on Steam, PS4, Xbox One and GOG!

►►► Get Lost Ember from Steam now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/563840/LOST_EMBER/

····················································································

A breathtakingly beautiful world holds the secrets of its past for you and your companion to uncover.

Experience the contrasting stories of the fall of mankind and the lush life in a world reclaimed by nature with a wolf as your main character and a determined companion at your side.

····················································································

Music: Maisy Kay - "Come Back Home"
from the "Lost Ember - Original Game Soundtrack" (also available on Steam ;))

····················································································

MORE LINKS:

• https://twitter.com/MooneyeStudios
• https://www.facebook.com/lostember
• https://www.facebook.com/mooneyestudios/
• https://www.instagram.com/mooneyestudios/

http://www.mooneyestudios.com/
lostember.com
